## Eligible Particpants 

Below I am going to create a new object including only those that we can prove are â‰¥ 65 and are using a BZRA by answering the question (c_sp). This is to ensure they are not using other medications that may have sedating properties such as antihistamines or SSRI's and that they are older adults and fit into the research population we want.

```{r}
#| label: Eligible Participant Code

SIMOA_ELIGIBLE <- SIMOA %>% 
  # Applying the filtering based on age_cat and age
  fitler(age_cat == 1 | (age_cat == 0 & age >= 65)) %>% 
  # Applying the filtering to keep only rows where any of c_sp___1 to c_sp___14 == 1

filter(c_sp)

```

The `echo: false` option disables the printing of code (only output is displayed).
